ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.data

Class FModel<V extends FView>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.data.FModel<V>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fragment

    public class FModel<V extends FView>
extends Object
    The Model that all Fragment Models must extend. Contains methods to update all of the FViews that are listening to us

      FModel()
      Sole constructor for the FModel.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addView(V view)
      Adds a view to our list of views if it isn't already there
      void deleteView(V view)
      Removes a view from our list of views.
      void notifyViews()
      Notifies all of our attached FViews that we have changed and that they should update.
